content: a quick design i made for my little one when the first name he knew from sesame street was occar i used touch of alpaca for most of oscar s body and a bulky yarn from my stash for his trash can gauge is not crucial just make sure you are using a hook that will give you a tight stitch g and j are recommended my trashcan still came out a little soft but i like how it makes it look dented like oscar s real can i admit i did not put as much time into writing out the pattern steps as usual so please don t hesitate to contact me if you have questions enjoy
